a.span: LPS COVID19 and Remote Learning Resource Site

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/QH3W63mY1ENfS7BsXGBB9nR_82nfD5Qr5Jfx7YImYSj2kaba3Jwl0Nu117sQX9NL-WPNaYFPAw=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h3: Joy in learning, curiosity in life, and compassion in all we do.

div.p: April 24-26, 2020 (Click on photo for more information)

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Lexington Public Schools are closed through the end of the scheduled school year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Despite school closures, Lexington Public Schools remains committed to students and families by supporting our district mission and core values.
See updates and news from the Lexington Superintendent of Schools on Twitter at @lexingtonsuper
